get.description: Returns a list of campaigns

post.description: Creates a new marketing campaign in the CRM

startdate.description: The start date of the campaign
startdate.title: Start Date

budget.description: The total budget for the campaign
budget.title: Total Budget

promotype.description: The type or category of the campaign (such as Google Search)
promotype.title: Promotion Category

manager.description: The employee who manages the campaign
manager.title: Employee (Manager)

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific campaign request by id

put.description: Updates a marketing campaign in the CRM

startdate.description: What is the campaign start date
startdate.title: Start Date

get.description: Returns a list of requested communication ID's

contactid.description: The contact ID of the communication (blank for lead)
contactid.title: Contact ID

leadid.description: The Lead ID of the communication (zero for contact based)
leadid.title: Lead ID

employee.description: CRM Employee name who performed action
employee.title: Employee Name

campaign.description: The marketing campaign linked to the communication
campaign.title: Marketing campaign

billed.description: Has the communication entry been billed by the CRM
billed.title: Is Billed

get.description: Returns field details

employee.description: The employee name that performed the action
employee.title: Employee Name

endtime.description: The end time of the communication
endtime.title: End Time

workorder.description: The work order number linked to the event
workorder.title: Workorder ID

project.description: The project ID of the communication
project.title: Project ID

campaign.description: The ID of the linked campaign
campaign.title: Campaign Link

length.description: How long the event took place
length.title: Event Length

billed.description: Has entry been invoiced in the CRM
billed.title: Is Billed

Retrieve list of followups

contactid.description: The contact ID linked to the followup (blank for lead)
contactid.title: Contact ID

leadid.description: The lead ID of the followup (0 for contact)
leadid.title: Lead ID

type.title: Follow Up Type

comments.description: Comments or Instructions related to the followup
comments.title: Comments or Instructions

assignedto.description: The employee name assigned to the followup
assignedto.title: Employee Assigned To

setby.description: The employee name that set the followup
setby.title: Employee Set By

duedate.description: The due date of the followup
duedate.title: Due Date

reminderminutes.description: Number of minutes before event for reminder (0 = none)
reminderminutes.title: Reminder Minutes

type.description: The type of the followup (call back, gotomeeting, etc)

vendor.description: The updated vendor for the item
